plugin.name: Auto Card Link
plugin.description: Automatically convert URLs to beautiful card links

general.title: General Settings
general.autoConvert: Auto convert URLs to card links
general.autoConvertDescription: Automatically convert pasted URLs to card links
general.showInMenuDescription: Whether to add commands to the right-click menu

screenshot.title: Screenshot Settings
screenshot.extraParamsDesc: Add extra parameters to customize screenshot output.
screenshot.paramTip2: Multiple parameters should be chained together (e.g., &device=tablet&delay=5000)
screenshot.paramTip3: Do not include API key parameter

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.preferLocalImagesDescription: Use local images instead of remote ones when available
advanced.downloadImagesDescription: Download remote images to local attachment folder
advanced.showSuccessNoticeDescription: Show notification after successfully creating card links
advanced.indentLevelDescription: Indentation level for card link code blocks

errors.internalLinkQuotes: Internal links must be surrounded by quotes
errors.yamlParseError: Failed to parse YAML. Check debug console for more detail
errors.missingRequiredParams: Required parameters [url, title] are not found
errors.fetchPageFailed: Failed to fetch page. Status code: {{status}}
errors.saveImageFailed: Failed to save image to attachment folder
